page.title: 09FAIRFIELD NURSERY, HERMITAGE
page.content: Fairfield's, situated on the Priors Court Road, is a garden centre selling additional items, such as food. It also rents out land from its 9 or 10 acres to other companies, such as Kalehurst and Hills who sell their own related items. The company is now fifteen years old. Most people who answered our survey thought that the service at Fairfields is good. Sunday is the busier day of the weekend, and the most popular day of the week for customers. The car park at Fairfields holds 350 cars. Most of those surveyed shopped for plants, and although very few thought the centre needed to be expanded, several people expressed a wish for a coffee shop and a play area. The owner of Fairfields is Lord Norry.
